class.description: Lets robot sleep for a specified amount of time at waypoint arrival
Run-time plugin that takes photos at waypoint arrivals when using waypoint follower node. Saves the taken photos to specified directory.
Lets robot wait for input at waypoint arrival

class.name: nav2_waypoint_follower::LiftAtWaypoint
class.description: Lift at waypoint plugin to control the z-axis speed.
